name: Airlocked
description:
Time is running out... Your oxygen reserves are running low, your thrusters are malfunctioning, and you need to make it to the escape pod and out off the Space Station before you die. Be careful not to hit anything... It's hard to control yourself in the low gravity of space.

This Project was made as part of the GMTK GameJam 2020 with the theme "Out Of Control" 

Created by Wendigo Meadows

Wendigo Meadows are: 

Tom Flannigan

James McNabb

Sam Wills
